General.Name: Orissa Bengal Carrier Limited
General.Description: Orissa Bengal Carrier Limited offers transportation and logistics services in India. The company offers full truck load transport, and parcel and part truck load/less than truck load services. It serves the steel, coal, aluminum, cement, petrochemical, paper, marble, tiles, infra, textile, and FMCG industries. Orissa Bengal Carrier Limited was incorporated in 1994 and is headquartered in Raipur, India.
General.Address: A-1, C.G. Elite complex, Raipur, India, 492001
